channel.title: Hi there, I'm Brennan Dunn of Planscope
channel.description:
My name is Brennan Dunn, and I'm the founder of [Planscope][1], a project management app for freelancers and teams of consultants.
I also work on...
- [Freelancer's Weekly][2], my newsletter with 6.5k+ subscribers (essentially my primary customer acquisition channel for everything I do.) - Author of ["Double Your Freelancing Rate"][3] and ["Sell Yourself Online: The Blueprint"][4] - I teach a [monthly workshop][5] on consulting (and do occasional [one-off workshops][6]) - I host [The Business of Freelancing][7] podcast
The newsletter, books, and podcast have worked amazingly well to bring in new Planscope customers (> 60% of new subscribers come from one of the above), and I've also had a lot of luck ranking for freelance-specific keywords.
I'm working on some more team-focused reporting features right now, as $199/mo >>>>> $24/mo :smile: (plus, freelancers tend to have a *very hard time* staying in business, and the first thing they do when work dries up is cancel things like Planscope.)
Cheers, Brennan
[1]: https://planscope.io/ [2]: http://freelancersweekly.com/ [3]: http://doubleyourfreelancingrate.com/ [4]: http://doubleyourfreelancingrate.com/the-blueprint [5]: http://doubleyourfreelancingrate.com/build-a-consultancy [6]: http://recurringrevenueforconsultants.com/ [7]: http://brennandunn.com/category/podcast/

item.title: Hi there, I'm Brennan Dunn of Planscope
item.dc:creator: Christopher
item.description:
Hey Brennan.

Looking at it from the outside, I’m really impressed with Planscope both as an app and as a business. There are only a handful of apps that cause me to think “wow, that’s great, I wish I’d built that!” and Planscope is one of them.

That said, I intend to shameless ape your marketing methods to help me get SmallSpec rolling!

Read full topic
item.source: Hi there, I'm Brennan Dunn of Planscope

item.title: Hi there, I'm Brennan Dunn of Planscope
item.dc:creator: brennandunn
item.description:
My name is Brennan Dunn, and I’m the founder of Planscope, a project management app for freelancers and teams of consultants.

I also work on…

  • Freelancer’s Weekly, my newsletter with 6.5k+ subscribers (essentially my primary customer acquisition channel for everything I do.)
  • Author of “Double Your Freelancing Rate” and “Sell Yourself Online: The Blueprint”
  • I teach a monthly workshop on consulting (and do occasional one-off workshops)
  • I host The Business of Freelancing podcast

The newsletter, books, and podcast have worked amazingly well to bring in new Planscope customers (> 60% of new subscribers come from one of the above), and I’ve also had a lot of luck ranking for freelance-specific keywords.

I’m working on some more team-focused reporting features right now, as $199/mo >>>>> $24/mo (plus, freelancers tend to have a very hard time staying in business, and the first thing they do when work dries up is cancel things like Planscope.)

Cheers,
Brennan
